meanings.definition: Passes: moves in a specified direction
meanings.sent1: The ball pases through the hoop.
meanings.sent2: She pases the ball to her teammate.
meanings.sent3: The cat pases the dog in a playful chase.
meanings.sent4: Time pases quickly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The river pases gently through the valley.

meanings.definition: Pases: third person singular present of 'pase'
meanings.sent1: He pases the ball to his friend.
meanings.sent2: She pases the exam with flying colors.
meanings.sent3: The bird pases the message along the treetops.
meanings.sent4: The sun pases its warmth to the earth.
meanings.sent5: The wind pases through the open window.

meanings.sent1: They each bought two pases for the concert.
meanings.sent2: The museum tickets include unlimited pases.
meanings.sent3: The pases for the train ride were sold out.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of pases from different countries is impressive.
meanings.sent5: The golden pases granted them access to the VIP area.
